text: The 2003 Southern District Council election was held on 23 November 2003 to elect all 17 elected members to the 21-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:11.77%;" | 2 | style="background:red; width:88.23%;" | 15 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:11.77%;" | 2 | style="background:red; width:88.23%;" | 15 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== Category:2003 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2003 Southern District Council election
